verbose_text: To determine whether embryonic TSFCs reside within the FoxN1 neg lineage, we used the previously described lineage tracing mouse model FoxN1 Cre x Rosa26-Tomato-GFP, in which FoxN1 promoter driven Cre expression causes a switch from red to green fluorescent reporter protein expression, marking the FoxN1 neg lineage as Tomato pos and the FoxN1 pos lineage as GFP pos (XREF_FIG D).
